1168.name: Dur 6 PTA Powder
1168.Applications: Outstanding alloy against abrasion, thermo-shock and corrosion combined with high temperatures. Dur 6 PTA Powder is the most widely used of the wear resistant cobalt based alloys and exhibits good all-round performance. It is regarded as the industry standard for general-purpose wear resistance applications.
1168.Suitable_For: Examples include valve seats and gates; pump shafts and bearings, erosion shields and rolling couples. It is often used self-mated.
